name: TKLinks Saver Favorite Links
summary: Learn about .TKFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: TKLinks Saver was developed by TKSoftware and Designs. It is now discontinued.

description: A TKFL file is a favorites file created by TKLinks Saver, a program that allows users to save lists of internet URLs. It contains a list of links that a user has favorited. Opening a TKFL file in TKLinks Saver allows a user to access the URLs it lists.

instructions: You can open a TKFL file with TKSoftware and Designs TKLinks Saver (Windows), provided you still have access to that program. If you do not have access to TKLinks Saver, you likely will not be able to open your TKFL file, as TKLinks Saver is discontinued and no longer available.
